prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Step-by-step plan for the headless agent. Start with: You are running headlessly. There is no conversation — do not ask questions. Then list numbered steps. Include all record IDs directly in the steps — the headless agent has no memory of this conversation. The last step must use NotifyUser to deliver results with a targetId linking the relevant record. Important: NotifyUser body is plain text only (max 750 chars), no markdown, no HTML, no links. Use numbered lists with record names only. Only one record can be linked via targetId.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: When to run in the users local time: minute hour dayOfMonth month dayOfWeek optionalYear. e.g. 0 9 ? * MON-FRI for weekdays at 9am, 30 14 ? * MON for Mondays at 2:30pm.
